template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.description: Communication with the vSphere server through a self-signed certificate
template_input_params.label: vSphere server communication through self-signed certificate

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation.
template_input_params.label: vSphere Datacenter

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere cluster to host the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere resource pool to host the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: vSphere Resource Pool

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_folder
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere folder for the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: vSphere Folder Name

template_input_params.name: user_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: User-defined public SSH key used to connect to the virtual machine. This key must be in openSSH format.
template_input_params.label: User Public SSH Key - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_access_token
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_service
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Service
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Service

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: The private, base64-encoded CAMC SSH key that is used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key for connection to the virtual guest

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key value that is used to connect to a guest. Used on VMware only.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key value for connection to a guest on VMware

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo
template_input_params.description: URL to the IBM Installation Manager repository (https://<hostname/IP>:<port>/IMRepo)
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_password
template_input_params.description: Password to the IBM Installation Manager repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_user
template_input_params.description: The user name to access the IBM Installation Manager repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository Username

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_password
template_input_params.description: Password for the IBM software repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo
template_input_params.description: Root level of the IBM software repository (https://<hostname>:<port>)
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Root

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_user
template_input_params.description: The user name to access the IBM software repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Username

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_address
template_input_params.description: IPv4 address for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine IP Address

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Short Hostname

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_domain
template_input_params.description: Domain name of the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Domain Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_dns_servers
template_input_params.description: Domain name servers for the virtual network adapter.
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_dns_suffixes
template_input_params.description: Name resolution suffixes for the virtual network adapter.
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 gateway for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 prefix length for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_network_interface_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere port group or network label for the virtual machine's vNIC.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-image
template_input_params.description: Identifier of the operating system image or template that you use to create the virtual image. The template must be a plain Ubuntu operating system, with no additional software, such as Db2, already installed or configured.
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the administrator account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH.
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-os_password
template_input_params.description: Password for the operating system to access the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Operating System Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_memory
template_input_params.description: The amount of memory allocated to the virtual machine, in megabytes.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: The number of virtual CPUs for the virtual machine. This number must be a positive integer.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_thin_provisioned
template_input_params.description: The template disk volume is thin_provisioned.
template_input_params.label: Disk, thin_provisioned

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_size
template_input_params.description: Size of template disk volume. This size should be equal to the template disk size.
template_input_params.label: Root Disk Size

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_datastore
template_input_params.description: Name of the data storage cluster on the VM target disk.
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Datastore

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_keep_on_remove
template_input_params.description: Deletes the template disk when the virtual machine is deleted.
template_input_params.label: Delete template disk on virtual machine deletion

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_keystorepassword
template_input_params.description: Specifies the password to use on all keystore files that are created during profile creation.
template_input_params.label: WebSphere default keystore password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_os_user_name
template_input_params.description: The user identifier for the operating system that will be used to install the product. The identifier is created if it does not exist.
template_input_params.label: Workflow Installation User Identifier

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_os_user_shell
template_input_params.description: Shell that the operating system user uses for product installation
template_input_params.label: Shell for the operating system user

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_os_user_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: A flag that indicates whether to create the WebSphere user locally or to use an LDAP-based user
template_input_params.label: WebSphere to use LDAP for authentication

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_os_user_comment
template_input_params.description: Comments that you can add when you create the user identifier
template_input_params.label: Workflow comment

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_os_user_gid
template_input_params.description: The operating system group name that will be assigned to the product installation.
template_input_params.label: Workflow User Group Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_install_mode
template_input_params.description: The installation mode for IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation Mode

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_product_version
template_input_params.description: The product version of IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: Workflow product version

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_product_edition
template_input_params.description: The product edition of IBM Business Automation Workflow: Server, ESB, or Express
template_input_params.label: Workflow product edition

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_features
template_input_params.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise license: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise Production or IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise Non-production.
template_input_params.label: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise License

options.label: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise Production
IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise Non-production

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of WebSphere Application Server
template_input_params.label: WAS offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_profile_id
template_input_params.description: The profile identifier of WebSphere Application Server
template_input_params.default: IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V8.5
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server profile ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_baw_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: Workflow offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of the Db2 database system
template_input_params.label: Db2 offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_fixpack_names
template_input_params.description: The full name of the Business Automation Workflow, the WebSphere Application Server fix pack installation package, or both package names. Attention: Specify all parts of a product fix pack in the input field separated by a semi-colon(;). Specify each product fix packs in different input fields. For example, the Business Automation Workflow 19002 fix pack package has only one part. To install this package, specify the following information in the input field, and press Enter: workflow.19002.delta.repository.zip. The WebSphere Application Server 85515 fix pack package has three parts. To install this package too, specify the following information in a new input field, and press Enter:  8.5.5-WS-WAS-FP015-part1.zip; 8.5.5-WS-WAS-FP015-part2.zip; 8.5.5-WS-WAS-FP015-part3.zip
template_input_params.label: Fix Pack Packages

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ifix_names
template_input_params.description: The full names of interim fix installation packages; for example, 8.6.10018002-WS-BPM-IFJRXXXXX.zip.
template_input_params.label: Interim Fix Packages

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cell_admin_username
template_input_params.description: The name of the cell administrator.
template_input_params.label: Cell Administrator Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cell_admin_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password for the cell administrator.
template_input_params.label: Cell Administrator Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_de_admin_username
template_input_params.description: The user name of the deployment environment administrator.
template_input_params.label: Deployment Environment Administrator Username

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_de_admin_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password for the deployment environment administrator.
template_input_params.label: Deployment Environment Administrator Password

template_input_params.label: Configuration Product Type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_config_deployment_type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_environment_purpose
template_input_params.description: The Workflow Server environment: Development, Test, Staging, or Production.
template_input_params.label: Workflow Server Environment

template_input_params.description: The user name of the Db2 instance. Attention: If you set the value of the 'Local Db2 Installation' parameter to 'true' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation' section, the 'Db2 Instance Username' must have the same value as the 'Local Db2 Instance Username' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation' section.

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_instance_userpassword_config
template_input_params.description: The password for the Db2 instance. Attention: If you set the value of the 'Local Db2 Installation' parameter to 'true' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation' section, the 'Db2 Instance Password' must have the same value as the 'Local Db2 Instance Password' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation' section.

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_install
template_input_params.description: Installs the Db2 database system.

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_instance_username
template_input_params.description: The user name of the Db2 instance. Attention: If you set the value of the 'Local Db2 Installation' parameter to 'true', the 'Local Db2 Instance Username' must have the same value as the 'Db2 Instance Username' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Configuration - Db2' section.
template_input_params.label: Local Db2 Instance Username

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_instance_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password for the Db2 instance. Attention: If you set the value of the 'Local Db2 Installation' parameter to 'true', the 'Local Db2 Instance Password' must have the same value as the 'Db2 Instance Password' in the 'IBM Business Automation Workflow Configuration - Db2' section.
template_input_params.label: Local Db2 Instance Password

template_input_params.name: metering_url
